divs: Sighting Detailscoming home from a football match. The size it was much bigger than a plane My son saw it first and said what the hell is that ? We have neer seen anything like it before,it was like saturn in chape bu silver and smaller,it made no noise,and it had lights flashing. I was not scared at all just a bi excited to have seen one.We have an airport about 30 minutes away,but he flight path is the opposit way to what the UFo was going. It disappeared in the distance. I took a photo bt it was too far away and the window glass reflextion makes it look nothing like it was
Summary: it was silver in colour,wit lights,it was sauce shaped and didnt move that fast.
